extracted_information: Comprehensive API documentation for Porkbun API V3 Beta, covering domain management, DNS management, and SSL certificate retrieval via JSON content sent to URI endpoints via HTTP POST. Authentication requires API key and secret API key. Includes details on endpoint URIs, parameters, response elements, examples, error handling, and rate limits for domain checks.

errors.http_status_codes: Any HTTP response code other than 200 is an error.
errors.status_element: Errors are indicated in the 'status' element of the returned JSON.
errors.403_error: Additional authentication information is required, such as a two factor code.

domain_pricing_endpoint.description: Check default domain pricing information for all supported TLDs.

endpoints.name: Ping
endpoints.description: Tests communication with the API and returns your IP address.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: yourIp
response_elements.description: Your IP address.

endpoints.name: Domain Update Name Servers
endpoints.description: Update the name servers for your domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

command_elements.name: ns
command_elements.description: An array of name servers that you would like to update your domain with.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: Domain Get Name Servers
endpoints.description: Get the authoritative name servers listed at the registry for your domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: ns
response_elements.description: An array of name server host names.

endpoints.name: Domain List All
endpoints.description: Get all domain names in account. Domains are returned in chunks of 1000.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

command_elements.name: start
command_elements.description: An index to start at when retrieving the domains, defaults to 0. To get all domains increment by 1000 until you receive an empty array.

command_elements.name: includeLabels
command_elements.description: If set to 'yes' we will return label information for the domains if it exists. Valid options are 'yes' or 'no'.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: domains
response_elements.description: An array of domains and domain details in the account. Includes domain, status, tld, createDate, expireDate, securityLock, whoisPrivacy, autoRenew, notLocal, labels.

endpoints.name: Domain Add URL Forward
endpoints.description: Add URL forward for a domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

command_elements.name: subdomain
command_elements.description: A subdomain that you would like to add URL forwarding for. Leave this blank to forward the root domain.

command_elements.name: location
command_elements.description: Where you'd like to forward the domain to.

command_elements.name: type
command_elements.description: The type of forward. Valid types are: temporary or permanent

command_elements.name: includePath
command_elements.description: Whether or not to include the URI path in the redirection. Valid options are yes or no.

command_elements.name: wildcard
command_elements.description: Also forward all subdomains of the domain. Valid options are yes or no.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: Domain Get URL Forwarding
endpoints.description: Get URL forwarding for a domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: forwards
response_elements.description: An array of forwarding records for the domain. Includes id, subdomain, location, type, includePath, wildcard.

endpoints.name: Domain Delete URL Forward
endpoints.description: Delete a URL forward for a domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: Domain Check
endpoints.description: Check a domain's availability.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: response
response_elements.description: The availability response. Includes avail, type, price, firstYearPromo, regularPrice, premium, additional (renewal, transfer pricing).

response_elements.name: limits
response_elements.description: Rate limit information for the domain check endpoint. Includes TTL, limit, used, naturalLanguage.

limits.naturalLanguage: 1 out of 1 checks within 10 seconds used.

endpoints.name: Domain Create Glue Record
endpoints.description: Create glue record for a domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: Domain Update Glue Record
endpoints.description: Update glue record for a domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

command_elements.name: ips
command_elements.description: An array of IP addresses. Current IP addresses will be removed and replaced with these ones.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: Domain Delete Glue Record
endpoints.description: Delete glue record for a domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: Domain Get Glue Records
endpoints.description: Get glue records for a domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: hosts
response_elements.description: An array of glue records, including host name and IP addresses (v4 and v6).

endpoints.name: DNS Create Record
endpoints.description: Create a DNS record.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

command_elements.name: name
command_elements.description: The subdomain for the record being created, not including the domain itself. Leave blank to create a record on the root domain. Use * to create a wildcard record.

command_elements.name: type
command_elements.description: The type of record being created. Valid types are: A, MX, CNAME, ALIAS, TXT, NS, AAAA, SRV, TLSA, CAA, HTTPS, SVCB

command_elements.name: content
command_elements.description: The answer content for the record.

command_elements.name: ttl
command_elements.description: The time to live in seconds for the record. The minimum and the default is 600 seconds.

command_elements.name: prio
command_elements.description: The priority of the record for those that support it.

command_elements.name: notes
command_elements.description: Any notes that you'd like to set for the record.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: id
response_elements.description: The ID of the record created.

endpoints.name: DNS Edit Record by Domain and ID
endpoints.description: Edit a DNS record.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

command_elements.name: name
command_elements.description: The subdomain for the record being created, not including the domain itself. Leave blank to create a record on the root domain. Use * to create a wildcard record.

command_elements.name: type
command_elements.description: The type of record being created. Valid types are: A, MX, CNAME, ALIAS, TXT, NS, AAAA, SRV, TLSA, CAA, HTTPS, SVCB

command_elements.name: content
command_elements.description: The answer content for the record.

command_elements.name: ttl
command_elements.description: The time to live in seconds for the record. The minimum and the default is 600 seconds.

command_elements.name: prio
command_elements.description: The priority of the record for those that support it.

command_elements.name: notes
command_elements.description: Any notes that you'd like to set for the record. Passing an empty string will clear the notes, passing null will make no changes.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: DNS Edit Record by Domain, Subdomain and Type
endpoints.description: Edit all records for the domain that match a particular subdomain and type.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

command_elements.name: content
command_elements.description: The answer content for the record.

command_elements.name: ttl
command_elements.description: The time to live in seconds for the record. The minimum and the default is 600 seconds.

command_elements.name: prio
command_elements.description: The priority of the record for those that support it.

command_elements.name: notes
command_elements.description: Any notes that you'd like to set for the record. Passing an empty string will clear the notes, passing null will make no changes.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: DNS Delete Record by Domain and ID
endpoints.description: Delete a specific DNS record.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: DNS Delete Records by Domain, Subdomain and Type
endpoints.description: Delete all records for the domain that match a particular subdomain and type.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: DNS Retrieve Records by Domain or ID
endpoints.description: Retrieve all editable DNS records associated with a domain or a single record for a particular record ID.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: records
response_elements.description: An array of DNS records. Includes id, name, type, content, ttl, prio, notes.

endpoints.name: DNS Retrieve Records by Domain, Subdomain and Type
endpoints.description: Retrieve all editable DNS records associated with a domain, subdomain and type.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: records
response_elements.description: An array of DNS records. Includes id, name, type, content, ttl, prio, notes.

endpoints.name: DNSSEC Create Record
endpoints.description: Create a DNSSEC record at the registry.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: DNSSEC Get Records
endpoints.description: Get the DNSSEC records associated with the domain at the registry.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: records
response_elements.description: The DNSSEC records pulled from the registry. JSON object where keys are keyTags.

endpoints.name: DNSSEC Delete Record
endpoints.description: Delete a DNSSEC record associated with the domain at the registry.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

endpoints.name: SSL Retrieve Bundle by Domain
endpoints.description: Retrieve the SSL certificate bundle for the domain.
endpoints.authentication: API Key and Secret API Key in JSON command.

response_elements.name: status
response_elements.description: A status indicating whether or not the command was successfuly processed.

response_elements.name: certificatechain
response_elements.description: The complete certificate chain.

response_elements.name: privatekey
response_elements.description: The private key.

response_elements.name: publickey
response_elements.description: The public key.

json_response_example.certificatechain:
----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
...
-----END CERTIFICATE-----

----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
...
-----END CERTIFICATE-----

----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
...
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
